name: travel_delays
rows: Crash on I-84 westbound at Exit: I-81 SOUTH - WILKES-BARRE. There is a ramp restriction.
Flooding on PA 28 both directions between SR 0066 SH and TOWN RUN RD. All lanes closed.
Crash on I-80 eastbound between Exit 111: PA 153 - CLEARFIELD and Exit 120: PA 879 - CLEARFIELD/SHAWVILLE. All lanes closed.
CARVERSVILLE RD / COLD SPRING CREAMERY RD / FLEECY DALE RD
Downed utility on CARVERSVILLE RD / COLD SPRING CREAMERY RD / FLEECY DALE RD both directions between BURNT HOUSE HILL RD and WEST BRANDON WY. All lanes closed.
Ramp from I-76 to I-83 S
Roadwork on Ramp from I-76 to I-83 S.
Roadwork on I-76 westbound between Exit 345: 30TH STREET/MARKET STREET and Exit 344: I-676-US30 EAST - CENTRAL PHILA. All lanes closed.
Roadwork on I-76 westbound between Exit 346A: SOUTH STREET and Exit 345: 30TH STREET/MARKET STREET. There is a lane restriction.
Roadwork on I-95 southbound between Exit 26: BETSY ROSS BR/ARAMINGO AVE and Exit 25: ALLEGHENY AVE/CASTOR AVE. There is a lane restriction.
Road work on I-476 North. The 2 right lanes are closed.
Road work on I-476 South. The 2 right lanes are closed.
Roadwork on I-81 southbound between .1 miles south of Exit 170A: PA 115 SOUTH - BEAR CREEK and .5 miles north of Exit 168: HIGHLAND PARK BLVD/WILKES-BARRE. There is a lane restriction.
Roadwork on I-81 northbound between .7 miles north of Exit 168: HIGHLAND PARK BLVD/WILKES-BARRE and .1 miles south of Exit 170A: PA 115 SOUTH - BEAR CREEK. There is a lane restriction.
I-579 HOV LN / HOV LN TO/FR MELLON AR RD
Roadwork on I-579 HOV LN / HOV LN TO/FR MELLON AR RD both directions between Exit: BEDFORD AV /+ MARIO LEMIEUX PL and Exit: HOV LN TO/FR NORTHSHORE. All lanes closed.
Roadwork on HOV LN TO/FR NORTHSHORE both directions between Exit: MAZEROSKI WY /+ PNC PARK/HEINZ FIELD and Exit: LC TO PERRY HW. All lanes closed.
Debris on roadway on PA 28 southbound between 2 miles SOUTH of Exit 11: TO I-76 TURNPIKE/PA 910 - HARMAR and 1 miles NORTH of Exit 10: RIDC DRIVE. There is a lane restriction.
Roadwork on PA 348 westbound between MOORE RD and TRACO RD. There is a lane restriction. Max Width: 96 inches.
Utility work on PA 36 northbound between PARK AV and CALDER ST. There is a lane restriction.
Flooding on PA 956 both directions between FAYETTE NESHANNOCK RD and HIGHLAND AV. All lanes closed.
Bridge outage on WALKER RD both directions at WILSON CREEK RD. All lanes closed.
Road work on I-76 West. The right shoulder is closed.
Roadwork on US 6 eastbound between DELAWARE DR and New York State Line. There is a lane restriction.
GRANGE HALL RD / STUTZMAN RD / PLOWMAN RD / GAS CENTER RD / WEHRUM RD / REXIS RD
Roadwork on GRANGE HALL RD / STUTZMAN RD / PLOWMAN RD / GAS CENTER RD / WEHRUM RD / REXIS RD both directions between PLOWMAN RD and MACK DR. All lanes closed.
ART MUSEUM CR / ARCH ST / KELLY DR / BENJAMIN FRANKLIN PY
Roadwork on ART MUSEUM CR / ARCH ST / KELLY DR / BENJAMIN FRANKLIN PY southbound between TWENTIETH ST and PHILA-BEN FRANKLIN, RACE ST. There is a lane restriction.
Roadwork on PA 61 southbound between Exit: I-81 SOUTH - HARRISBURG and TERRY RICH BL. There is a lane restriction.
Roadwork on PA 61 southbound between ALTAMONT BL and 1 miles SOUTH of SCHUYLKILL MALL, SCHUYLKILL MALL RD. There is a lane restriction.
